messages.subject: Need a guinea pig ASAP
messages.msgSnippet: Is there anybody here who has *never* registered with LiveJournal? (Not you Barb... you were registered once) I need someone to represent some lost soul who
messages.messageBody:
Is there anybody here who has *never* registered with LiveJournal?
(Not you Barb... you were registered once) I need someone to
represent some lost soul who comes upon the LJ address and wants to
read some delicious miburo fiction. I need them to access the
journal and tell me what happens.

I know that it won't let me see anything but the main entry ---
everything behind the lj-cut (which will have to be done when posting
stories) and comments are denied --- when I'm not logged on, but I
want to make sure it's the same for someone LJ would never recognize.

The address is http://www.livejournal.com/~shq_spy_office/

Please, don't anyone start trying to join!!! I'm just getting set up
and need to do some experimenting before turning it loose. There's
nothing for you to see anyway at this point. It's nothing but an
empty shell.

Thanks!!!
pachi
